mapper.select: SELECT mgm.msg_group_idx AS chat_group_idx, ml.msg_group_cate AS chat_cate, msg_group_member_id AS chat_name, m.content AS last_chat, DATE_FORMAT(m.sendtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')AS last_chat_time, NULL AS crew_idx FROM msg_grp_member mgm JOIN message m ON mgm.msg_group_idx = m.group_idx JOIN message_list ml ON ml.msg_group_idx = mgm.msg_group_idx WHERE mgm.msg_group_idx IN (SELECT msg_group_idx FROM msg_grp_member WHERE msg_group_member_id = #{member_id}) AND msg_group_member_id != #{member_id} ORDER BY m.sendtime DESC LIMIT 1
